select1.label: Do you have a school code issued by the Ministry of Education?

input.label: School Code
input.hint: Note: This should be the same code issued by the Ministry of Education and used in the census of schools.

select1.label: What level of education does this school offer?

item.label: Primary, junior secondary, and senior secondary schools
Junior secondary and senior secondary schools

select1.label: Is this a nomadic school?
Is this a boarding school?
What type of education does the school offer?
What is the status of school recognition?
Can the road to the school be used all the time, even during the rainy season?

input.label: How many days in the last month were people not able to reach the school because the main road/route could not be used?
input.hint: Enter a number 0-31.

select1.label: Were most students able to come to school even when the main/regular route to the school was not accessible?

input.label: How far is the school, in kilometers, from the areas it serves (catchment area)?
input.hint: Enter 0 if less than 1 km.

input.label: What is the distance to the nearest secondary school in kilometers?
input.hint: Enter 0 id within 1 km or 9999 if you are a secondary school.

select1.label: Is there daily public transport from this primary school to where nearest the secondary school is located?

input.label: Please estimate the number of students who live further than 3 km from the school.
input.hint: Please enter the number of students. If none, then enter 0.

select.label: What power sources are available at this school?

select1.label: Is the Generator connected and functional?
The last time the Generator broke, how long did it take to fix it?

input.label: Please specify how long ago the Generator broke down (IN MONTHS)
input.hint: Enter 0 if less than one month

select1.label: Is the Solar system connected and functional?
The last time the Solar system broke, how long did it take to fix it?

input.label: Please specify how long ago the Solar system broke down (IN MONTHS)
input.hint: Enter 0 if less than one month

select1.label: Is the Grid connection/power/PHCN/NEPA connected and functional?
The last time the Grid connection/power/PHCN/NEPA broke, how long did it take to fix it?

input.label: Please specify how long ago the Grid connection/power/PHCN/NEPA broke down (IN MONTHS)
input.hint: Enter 0 if less than one month

input.label: How many days in past month was the school with no electricity/power from any source?
input.hint: Enter 0 if the school always had electricity/power.

select.label: What IMPROVED water sources are on the premises or less than 100 meters away?

select1.label: The last time the Pipe water stopped working or broke how long did it take to repair?
The last time the Borehole/tubewell stopped working or broke how long did it take to repair?
The last time the Protected well stopped working or broke how long did it take to repair?

input.label: How many days in the past month was the school without water from any of the sources you have indicated as available?
input.hint: Please enter 0 if water was always available

input.label: How many days in the past month was the school without POTABLE water from any of the sources you have indicated as available?
input.hint: Please enter 0 if potable water was always available

input.label: Note: Do not ask the next question aloud. Respond to the question based on your own observation of the school buildings.

select1.label: How would you describe how a majority of the school buildings look?
Is the school a temporary structure for nomadic schools?

select.label: What type of toilets are on the premises?

select1.label: Where do the flush or pour flush toilets drain to?

item.label: Piped water system, septic tank, or pit latrine
Street, yard/compound, open sewer, a ditch, a drainage way or other location

input.label: How many Flush or pour flush are on the premises?
input.hint: If there are no Flush or pour flush on the premises then write "0".

input.label: How many days in the last month were the Flush or pour flush toilets not working?
input.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.

input.label: How many Ventilated improved pit latrine (VIP) are on the premises?
input.hint: If there are no Ventilated improved pit latrine (VIP) on the premises then write "0".

input.label: How many days in the last month were the Ventilated improved pit latrine (VIP) toilets not working?
input.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.

input.label: How many Pit latrine with slab are on the premises?
input.hint: If there are no Pit latrine with slab on the premises then write "0".

input.label: How many days in the last month were the Pit latrine with slab toilets not working?
input.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.

input.label: How many Pit latrine without slab/open pit are on the premises?
input.hint: If there are no Pit latrine without slab/open pit on the premises then write "0".

input.label: How many days in the last month were the Pit latrine without slab/open pit toilets not working?
input.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.

input.label: How many Bucket system are on the premises?
input.hint: If there are no Bucket system on the premises then write "0".

input.label: How many days in the last month were the Bucket system toilets not working?
input.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.

input.label: How many Other are on the premises?
input.hint: If there are no Other on the premises then write "0".

input.label: How many days in the last month were the Other toilets not working?
input.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.

select1.label: Are there separate toilets for males and females?

input.label: How many days in the last month were school buildings swept/cleaned?
input.hint: Enter a number 0-31.

input.label: How many days in the last month was rubbish or waste collected or burned or appropriately disposed?
input.hint: Enter a number 0-31.

Able to get mobile phone signal anywhere within the school buildings and the school compound

Are there sufficient living quarters for teachers?
How would you describe the physical status of the teachers living quarters?
